    • Uses of Gauge in com.codahale.metrics

      Classes in com.codahale.metrics that implement Gauge 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CachedGauge<T>
      A Gauge implementation which caches its value for a period of time.
      class  DerivativeGauge<F,T>
      A gauge whose value is derived from the value of another gauge.
      class  JmxAttributeGauge
      A Gauge implementation which queries an MBeanServerConnection for an attribute of an object.
      class  RatioGauge
      A gauge which measures the ratio of one value to another.
      Methods in com.codahale.metrics that return types with arguments of type Gauge 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SortedMap<String,Gauge> MetricRegistry.getGauges()
      Returns a map of all the gauges in the registry and their names.
      SortedMap<String,Gauge> MetricRegistry.getGauges(MetricFilter filter)
      Returns a map of all the gauges in the registry and their names which match the given filter.
